error_on_write.description: If true, will return an error on any write message rather than consume from the channel

error_on_migrate.description: If true, will return an error on migrate table messages rather than consume from the channel

error_on_insert.description: If true, will return an error on insert record messages rather than consume from the channel

batch_writer.description: Whether to use a BatchWriter or not.

batch_size.description:
Maximum number of items that may be grouped together to be written in a single write.

Defaults to `10000`.

batch_size_bytes.description:
Maximum size of items that may be grouped together to be written in a single write.

Defaults to `52428800` (50 MiB).

batch_timeout.description:
Maximum interval between batch writes.

Defaults to `30s`.
